citations.narrative:
Approximately 10% of the guinea pig pens have wooden sides of the enclosures chewed, worn down, and have unsealed,
exposed wood.
Chewed exposed wood is not impervious to moisture and cannot be properly cleaned and sanitized which can lead to
disease spread.
Primary enclosures for guinea pigs need to be structurally sound, maintained in good repair, and be constructed of
material substantially impervious to moisture.
Correct by: January 3, 2025
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
3.28(a)(1) 
   
Primary enclosures. 
Approximately 10% of the guinea pig pens have wooden sides of the enclosures chewed, worn down, and have unsealed, 
exposed wood. 
Chewed exposed wood is not impervious to moisture and cannot be properly cleaned and sanitized which can lead to 
disease spread. 
Primary enclosures for guinea pigs need to be structurally sound, maintained in good repair, and be constructed of 
material substantially impervious to moisture.  
Correct by: January 3, 2025 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
